Entries.movieTheater: @, there's a movie theater in town again! I can't wait to take George out, he used to love movies.#$b#Action movies were his absolute favorite, he loved the %name Smith series.$h
Entries.winter_7{{YearRemainder}}: @, it's almost the Feast of the Winter Star! I'm always looking forward to the Feast around this time of year.
Entries.winter_8{{YearRemainder}}: Oh, I should bring the good doctor a casserole, shouldn't I? The man works so hard, he doesn't take care of himself.

Entries.15_2: Honey, I just made some cookies. Please have one, dearie. [223]$h
